text: Hirschau is a municipality in Amberg-Sulzbach, a district (Landkreis) in the Upper Palatinate. == Villages == Hirschau has the following villages: * Burgstall * Dienhof * Ehenfeld * Krickelsdorf * Kricklhof * Krondorf * Massenricht * Obersteinbach * Steiningloh * Untersteinbach * Weiher == References == Category:Amberg-Sulzbach
title: Hirschau
